body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Tyler Foster. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Tyler, my name is Deborah Bennett. I'm interested in purchasing a car and needed some information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Deborah. I'd be happy to help you with that. Could you please let me know which model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at the new model of the Mercedes-Benz C-Class.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent choice! Could I please have your contact number so I can send you some detailed information about the model?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Deborah. Also, could you provide your email address so I can send you our latest offers and deals?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! It's deborah.bennett at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I'll make sure to get that information sent over to you shortly. Do you have any further questions at this time?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, Tyler. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Deborah. Thank you for reaching out to Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Tyler Foster and the customer's name is Deborah Bennett.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
